hints_html:
Given the rate of change of some process r(t), the total change over the time interval \(a \leq t \leq b\) is given by

\[\begin{aligned} \int_{a}^{b}r(t)dt\end{aligned}\]
hints_raw:
Given the rate of change of some process ''r(t)'', the total change over the time interval <math>a \leq t \leq b</math> is given by

:<math>
\int_{a}^{b}r(t)dt
</math>
sols_html:
Given that the rate of change of volume is \(10\sin (\pi t/10)\) cubic centimetres per day, the total change in the volume between t=0 and t=5, in cubic centimetres, is

\[\begin{aligned} \int_{0}^{5}10\sin (\pi t/10)dt &= \left [10 \frac{-10}{\pi} \cos (\pi t/10) \right ]_{0}^{5} \\ &= \frac{-100}{\pi}\left (\cos(5 \pi/10)-\cos(0/10) \right ) \\ &= \frac{-100}{\pi}(0-1) \\ &= \color{blue} \frac{100}{\pi}\end{aligned}\]
sols_raw:
Given that the rate of change of volume is <math>10\sin (\pi t/10)</math> cubic centimetres per day, the total change in the volume between ''t=0'' and ''t=5'', in cubic centimetres, is

:<math> \begin{align}
\int_{0}^{5}10\sin (\pi t/10)dt &= \left [10 \frac{-10}{\pi} \cos (\pi t/10) \right ]_{0}^{5} \\
&= \frac{-100}{\pi}\left (\cos(5 \pi/10)-\cos(0/10) \right ) \\
&= \frac{-100}{\pi}(0-1) \\
&= \color{blue} \frac{100}{\pi}
\end{align}</math>
statement_html: The level of water in a reservoir changes over the year due to inflow and outflow. If the volume at \(\displaystyle t=0\) is \(\displaystyle 10^4\) cubic metres and the rate of change of volume is \(\displaystyle 10\sin(\pi t/10)\) cubic metres per day, where t is the time in days, find the total change in the volume between \(\displaystyle t=0\) and \(\displaystyle t=5\).
statement_latex:
The level of water in a reservoir changes over the year due to inflow
and outflow. If the volume at $\displaystyle t=0$ is
$\displaystyle 10^4$ cubic metres and the rate of change of volume is
$\displaystyle 10\sin(\pi t/10)$ cubic metres per day, where \emph{t} is
the time in days, find the total change in the volume between
$\displaystyle t=0$ and $\displaystyle t=5$.
statement_raw: The level of water in a reservoir changes over the year due to inflow and outflow. If the volume at <math> \displaystyle t=0</math> is <math> \displaystyle 10^4</math> cubic metres and the rate of change of volume is <math> \displaystyle 10\sin(\pi t/10)</math> cubic metres per day, where ''t'' is the time in days, find the total change in the volume between <math> \displaystyle t=0</math> and <math> \displaystyle t=5</math>.
